articles.title: Ex-NASA Scientist Claims He Broke the Laws of Physics by Finding a Way to Defy Earth’s Gravity - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: A former NASA scientist claims to have developed a propulsion system that defies gravity without propellant, challenging the laws of physics if proven true.
articles.content: Charles Buhler, who co-founded Exodus Propulsion Technologies, shared details of the project in an interview with The Debrief, stating that the system achieves center-of-mass movement without expelli… [+4445 chars]
